name: Animal Kart Racing
description:
Racing game up to four local players with cute animals. 3 Animals with their respective karts and 5 different race tracks to play on. Highly recommend to play with friends!

----------------------------------------------

Controller Support Only!

Controls:

  • Movement - Left Analog Stick
  • A - Accelerate/Select
  • B - Reverse
  • Right Bumper - Drift
  • Esc Key - To force Main Menu

----------------------------------------------
